alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 13 at 2:30AM CDT until May 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Minnesota, West Polk, Kittson and West Marshall Counties. In North Dakota, Pembina, Eastern Walsh, Grand Forks, Steele and Traill Counties. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected from 1 PM to 6 PM.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Steele; Traill
